overview:
Marketing Coordinator, Health Advocate

Alix studied at the University of Maryland, where she earned a Bachelor of Arts in Communications. She is currently a candidate for a Masters degree in Food Studies at New York University.

A dedicated Pesco-Vegetarian (mostly vegetarian diet, with some seafood), her interest in food and healthy living developed in her early teens. Her love for animals and strong sense of responsibility for our planet inspired the lifestyle shift and she makes conscious food choices daily and regularly seeks wholesome cuisine, sustainable food and vegetarian-friendly dining experiences.

At Behind the Burner, she works on promoting and expanding our reach. She cannot imagine a more perfect environment in which to grow. She feels fortunate to work in such an exciting atmosphere where she is contributing and actively involved in what goes on behind the scenes in the food world. When Alix isn’t keeping the trains running at the office, she enjoys her daily runs, pilates/yoga classes at the gym, spending countless hours watching The Food Network and reading the latest health and food publications.
